alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 4:25PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Jefferson and southern Thomas Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monticello. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Boston, Alma, Fincher, Dills, Jarrott, Montivilla, Everett, Eason, Metcalf, Oaklawn and Festus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
